buttons-and-leds.title: Keenetic button functions
buttons-and-leds.title-leds: The functions of Keenetic buttons and indicators
buttons-and-leds.sub-title:
You can reassign the functions of the Keenetic hardware buttons by choosing the button, then selecting drop-down menu next to the pressing type you want and choosing an action.
The Status indicator on the Keenetic casing will guide you re. on/off status of the button you have chosen.

ui.reset-btns-link: Choose the default values for all buttons.
ui.reset-btns-and-leds-link: Select the default values for all buttons and indicators.
